bytedance/pasa

LLM agent that searches and filters academic papers automatically

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • LLM-powered tool for finding academic papers by content and metadata
  • Manages academic papers and scrapes metadata
  • Self-hosted academic search engine for 78 million papers
  • Local research assistant for private document analysis
  • Autonomous pipeline converts papers into academic homepages
  • deep research automation with language models, tools, web search, and Python execution
  • AI search engine with local LLM support
  • Privacy-focused alternative Goodreads front-end
  • Research papers on LLM agents, organized by taxonomy, covering methods, tools, security, applications, and survey insights
